title: Heart Hive is a new health app that lets you compare your metrics with peers
content:
From the creator of the popular app Heart Analyzer comes a new app with next-level analytics. Heart Hive joins the App Store, allowing users to share and compare their health metrics. Heart Hive records the information on your Apple Watch, and you can view it on your iPhone. 

more…

The post Heart Hive is a new health app that lets you compare your metrics with peers appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Heart Hive joins the App Store, allowing users to share and compare their health metrics with peers and other users from around the world.
